Generation III.Ruby: Rayquaza lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth's ozone layer, never descending to the ground. This Pok é mon appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.
Generation III.Sapphire: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth's ozone layer, above the clouds. Its existence had been completely unknown because it lived so high in the sky.
Generation III.Emerald: A Pok é mon that flies endlessly in the ozone layer. It is said it would descend to the ground if Kyogre and Groudon were to fight.
Generation III.FireRed: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.

Generation IV.Diamond: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
Generation IV.Pearl: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
Generation IV.Platinum: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.

Generation VI.X: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
Generation VI.Y: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
